ROM.Changelog: # Changelog * **ROM Changes** * Bump Dot version to v1.1 * Fingerprint: Setting up Pattern/Pin Fc fixed * dotOTA added(OTA system adapted for official devices) * fix dot version unknown * speed up lockscreen anims * Improve overall System animmation lag * Added timber as default music app * Display :Qspanel theme engine * QS tile titles visibility * Memory leak Optimisation * Three Finger Swipe for Screenshot * Advanced Bluetooth, Data, Wifi Toggles * Screenshot crop and share * Fingerprint authentication vibration * dotpapers: New walls added * Pocket mode added * added camera sound toggle * Allow disabling of FC dialogs * QS Header Icon settings * and few more bug fixes * Nov security patch * **Device Specific Changes** * Bumped to version 1.1 * Tweaks to increase battery backup * Control idle battery drain * Source sync on 24/11/2017
